name: Dreycey Albin
bio: ML Engineer and Computer Science PhD focused on production ML systems and evaluation at cloud scale. At Microsoft Azure, I build and ship ML-driven capacity decisioning in the control plane, including distributed inference, offline/online evaluation, telemetry, and guarded rollouts, delivering $100M+/year in CapEx impact. Experienced translating research ideas into reliable, user-facing capabilities across end-to-end data pipelines and Service Fabric microservices.
